mapper.select: select * from ticket where id=#{id} order by ticketNum desc limit 1
select * from ticket where id=#{id} and movieNum=#{movieNum} and status=1 limit 1
mapper.update: update ticket set status=2 where ticketNum=#{ticketNum}
update member set point=point+#{savePoint}-#{usedPoint} where id=#{id}
update seat set booked=1 where timeCode=#{timeCode} and seatNum=#{seatNum}
mapper.select: select movieNum, count(ticketNum) as amount from ticket where viewDate>sysdate() group by movieNum
select count(ticketNum) from ticket where viewDate>sysdate()
mapper.update: update movie set bookingRate=#{bookingRate} where movieNum=#{movieNum}
